channel.title: Jose Storopoli, PhD
channel.description: Recent content on Jose Storopoli, PhD

item.title: About
item.description: Director of Education and Training at Pumas-AI. Associate Professor at Universidade Nove de Julho. Open source and open access graduate course on Bayesian Statistics with Stan and Turing.jl code examples. Coauthor of Julia Data Science book. Directs the development of education and training materials for Pumas users in Julia. Member of the Turing.jl Developer Team. Certified RStudio Tidyverse Instructor.
item.content:encoded:
Director of Education and Training at Pumas-AI. Associate Professor at Universidade Nove de Julho.

Open source and open access graduate course on Bayesian Statistics with Stan and Turing.jl code examples.

Coauthor of Julia Data Science book. Directs the development of education and training materials for Pumas users in Julia. Member of the Turing.jl Developer Team. Certified RStudio Tidyverse Instructor.
